mandelbrot.title: Mandelbrot Set
mandelbrot.description: A program suitable for fractals based on polynoms.

orbittrap.title: Orbit Trap
orbittrap.description: A program for fractals based on polynoms with additional Orbit Trap capabilities

aggregate.title: Aggregate Orbit
aggregate.description: Suitable also for exponential functions and Newton/Nova-fractals

branching.title: Branching Addend
branching.description: Suitable for polynom functions with average branching.

lyapunov.title: Lyapunov Fractals
lyapunov.description: Highly customizable program for Lyapunov Fractals.
